title: Queen of Hearts

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Play a game of croquet against another player, roleblocking them.
- For 6 Malice, declare a player guilty of a crime. The following day, it will take one less vote to hang them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may alternatively play croquet against another dark magic member to temporarily give them Overprotective defense for tonight. They will, however, appear to visit you. This will not roleblock them. You may only do this once per Dark Magic member.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- Declaring a player guilty of a crime will additionally hide all votes against them.
- Playing a game of croquet against a non-Dark Magic member will have a 50% chance of you attacking them. You've never lost a game, nor will you admit defeat.
